nodes.bodyText: any side effects of using sw-manager topic? at least spam logs?
Why tests for object not related to flow topology are removed?
Do not remove this test. Replace FlowIntoData() with some other payload.
What about installEgressFlow, installEgressFlow and installOneSwitchFlow methods? What about deeper handling triggered from these methods?
